hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Did you know that the Kokiri Sword is as effective as Deku Sticks against Dead Hand?

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that you must read the names of "Special Deal" items in shops carefully.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's River#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mask of Truth#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Song of Storms# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: You would be surprised at all the things you can Hookshot in the Spirit Temple!

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #Saria's Song#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Spooky Mask#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #stable#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Barinade# holds...^ #a Wallet# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to the #Forest Medallion#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #2# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Skull Mask#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #3# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Bolero of Fire#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Skull Mask#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Zora Shop#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Zora Mask# and #Magic Beans#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mask of Truth#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #an Ice Trap#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Spooky Mask#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
